title: Remembering late PM
body_lines: A special commemoration ceremony was held to mark the 111th birth anniversary of Late Prime Minister Dudley Senanayake at his statue in Borella yesterday. His grand nephew former Minister Rukman Senanayake and other relatives were present at the event. The picture shows Deputy Mayor of Colombo garlanding the statue of the former Premier. Pix by Nisal Baduge
